name: Zombie Count
description:
Zombie Count is a top down shooter game.

There are three rooms and three guns but  unlimited zombies! 

Kill, count and escape!

Controls:

WASD to move, left click to shoot.

This game is my first jam game and it has some bugs that I couldn't fix because of limited time.  Developed for SimpleJam#3. I used free assets for the character, zombie and environment. You can find creators' name on credits.

Thanks for playing!
